    Write trial design files for field implementation

    write_trial_files.Rd

    Desc

    write_trial_files(
  trial_design,
  folder_path = NA,
  tr_file_name = NA,
  a_abline_file_name = NA,
  h_abline_file_name = NA,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  zip = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    trial_design

    (tibble) tibble that was created by applying assign_rate() to experimental plots made by make_exp_plots().

    folder_path

    (character) path to the folder in which the files will be saved

    tr_file_name

    (character) file name given to the trial design shape files

    a_abline_file_name

    (character) file name given to the applicator/planter ab-line shape files

    h_abline_file_name

    (character) file name given to the harvester ab-line shape files

    overwrite

    (logical) Default = FALSE. If TRUE, the existing shape file with the same file name will be overwritten.

    zip

    (logical) Default = FALSE. If TRUE, all the files that are being written will be zipped.

    Value

    write out files

    Contents

    Developed by Taro Mieno, Brittani Edge.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
